1.name: Bag
1.info: A nice tiny bag. Sad, it's empty...

2.name: Small Crystal
2.info: A small crystal. Looks quite beautiful.

3.name: Crystal
3.info: A sparkling crystal. For what so ever it should be useful...

4.name: Gold Nugget
4.info: A big gold nugget! I'm rich! (Even though I probably cannot buy anything on this island.)

5.name: Bag with Gold
5.info: A bag full of gold! Marvellous, and what's that good for on a lonely island?

7.name: Log
7.info: A heavy log. Why do I have to haul this bulky thing?

8.name: Bamboo
8.info: Handy, such a robust stuff! It's a great material to cut into bolts that I can shoot with an arbalest.

9.name: Meat
9.info: A juicy piece of raw meat. I can fry it, eat it as it is or take it in my hand and throw it at wild animals...

10.name: Meat (fried)
10.info: A big piece of fried meat.

11.name: Small Meat
11.info: A small piece of raw meat. Eatable, fryable and throwable.

12.name: Small Meat (fried)
12.info: A small piece of fried meat.

13.name: Blue Blossom
13.info: A blue blossom. Can be used to stop bleeding.

14.name: Banana
14.info: A delicious banana. Not only me but also monkeys do like it!

15.name: Leaf
15.info: A green leaf. I can use a stone to press the water out of leaves if I have many of them.

17.name: Healing Herb
17.info: A herb with a healing effect.

18.name: Strong Healing Herb
18.info: A healing herb with a very strong effect.

19.name: Goldherb
19.info: A golden herb. Good against dizziness.

21.name: Pebbles
21.info: Small pebbles - I'm sure they could be a good ammunition. All that's missing is something to fire it.

22.name: Flint
22.info: Striking two flint stones together provides the sparks needed to start a fire. Only one flint is useless...

23.name: Stone
23.info: A heavy stone which can be used to create useful survival tools.

24.name: Branch
24.info: A branch. You can make it bendable with water or light it with fire.

25.name: Bendable Branch
25.info: A branch which has been made bendable with water.

26.name: Vine
26.info: A long vine. I can use it for example as a whip to drove animals.

27.name: Coconut
27.info: A coconut. It will take long to eat it because of its hard hull.

28.name: Machete
28.info: A sharp machete. Good for close combat or to separate bark from trees.

30.name: Hammer
30.info: This hammer can be used to build stuff. It is also needed for combinations with iron.

34.name: Poison Mushroom
34.info: A green, poisonous mushroom. I should be able to press the poison out of it with a stone.

35.name: Dwarf Hat Mushroom
35.info: A mushroom which looks like the hat of a dwarf.

36.name: Healing Potion
36.info: A healing potion which heals the player for 30 seconds.

37.name: Poison
37.info: Bilious green poision. How that tastes? Maybe I should try...

38.name: Water
38.info: Fresh drinking water. You can also put it in your hand to throw it at fire.

39.name: Wine
39.info: Tasty wine. You shouldn't drink too much of it...

40.name: Bottle Post
40.info: A bottle post with a message inside. What might be written there?

41.name: Sheaf of Grain
41.info: I have to use it to get the grains out of it. In this state it's useless.

42.name: Grains
42.info: Can be grinded with a stone. Take them into your hand and use the ground in order to plant them.

43.name: Flour
43.info: A pile of flour. I can mix it with water to get dough.

44.name: Bread
44.info: A loaf of bread. Very filling!

45.name: Grapes
45.info: They can be eaten or I can make wine out of them. Take them into your hand and use the ground in order to plant them.

47.name: Juice
47.info: Healthy juice consisting of delicious fruits.

48.name: Cotton
48.info: Cotton, but for sure no cotton candy. I can use it to make cord out of it.

49.name: Cord
49.info: A tearproof cord - suitable to spin nets for fishing or catching butterflies.

50.name: Fishing Rod
50.info: A crooked fishing rod which allows me to fish! By fishing regularly I increase my skills and therefore my change of success.

51.name: Slingshot
51.info: A slingshot which can shoot small stuff like pebbles.

52.name: Spear
52.info: A spear which causes a lot of damage on animals. Every spear can be thrown only one time unless I'm an experienced hunter.

53.name: Arrow
53.info: An arrow with a solid arrowhead out of stone - causes raised damage.

54.name: Wooden Arrow
54.info: A plain wooden arrow - causes average damage.

55.name: Poison Arrow
55.info: This arrow causes poisoning. The target will die if it has no antidote!

56.name: Fire Arrow
56.info: This arrow will start a fire at the target which will cause a lot of damage.

58.name: Pistol
58.info: This pistol has a very good accuracy and range.

59.name: Bow
59.info: A simple bow which can shoot arrows.

60.name: Longbow
60.info: A bow with a very good range.

61.name: Golden Bow
61.info: A noble golden bow - causes a lot of damage!

62.name: Bolt
62.info: A wooden bolt, which can be shot with an arbalest for example.

63.name: Iron Bolt
63.info: A sharp iron bolt. Hurts pretty much if you get copped...

64.name: Arbalest
64.info: A wooden arbalest to shoot bolts. The fired projectiles become faster and more accurate than with a bow.

65.name: Watch
65.info: This thing shows the exact time.

69.name: Butterflies
69.info: These butterflies are helping me to carry more stuff. Thanks a lot, I owe you one!

70.name: Coffee Fruits
70.info: Coffee fruits which contain a lot of caffeine.

71.name: Bone
71.info: Yuck - a bone! I ain't no dog, right?!

72.name: Excrement
72.info: An elegant excrement. Also called shit or poop. This stuff stinks so much that I probably could poison someone with it...

73.name: Map
73.info: A map! I'll never lose my way again.

74.name: Sword
74.info: A simple sword, as in the Middle Ages. Whether there existed stranded guys at that time?

75.name: Broadsword
75.info: A sword with a very broad blade - even more Middle Ages Feeling in the tropics...

76.name: Crystal Blade
76.info: A sword with a blade made out of unbelievable hard and sharp crystal. Belongs to the basic equipment of each survival expert...

77.name: Volleyball
77.info: Yeah, nice! I'm just missing a net and an opponent...

78.name: Wilson
78.info: My best friend Wilson. I hope the 'Cast Away' people are not going to sue me for this...

79.name: Rocket
79.info: Missile for a rocket launcher - causes immense damage on impact!

80.name: Toxic Rocket
80.info: Guess why such toys are prohibited even in wars. All things in its range will be contaminated immediately.

81.name: Rocket Launcher
81.info: That damn thing is heavy as hell and absolutely dispensable on a lonely island... Unless I just can't find a better way to light a fire.

82.name: Dough
82.info: Simple dough made of flour and water. I can use it close to fire in order to bake it.

84.name: Spade
84.info: This spade can be used to dig (or to whack a beast over the head).

85.name: Iron
85.info: A clump of iron. I can use a hammer to process it, but it can be used as is likewise to make tools.

86.name: Iron Rod
86.info: A robust iron rod. Important resource for diverse tools!

87.name: Axe
87.info: Very good to damage things consisting of wood.

88.name: Pickaxe
88.info: Can be used to get minerals out of rocks more easily. Alternatively the pickaxe helps to eliminate rocks at all.

89.name: Fish
89.info: A raw fish. Can be eaten in sushi style or fried.

91.name: Joint
91.info: A joint that makes people fairly high. I should dispose it as fast as possible! Drugs are bad!

92.name: Key
92.info: A small key - it certainly belongs to a secret treasure chest buried at the beach...

93.name: Lock Pick
93.info: A handy tool which can be used to crack locks.

95.name: Claw
95.info: A sharp claw of some threatening animals.

96.name: Skin
96.info: Skin of wild animals. I can create a tent out of this stuff when I combine it with branches.

97.name: Tent
97.info: I need a hammer to build it up. If required I can just take it down and build it up somewehere else again!

98.name: Insect Parts
98.info: Crunchy parts of insects. They can be used as baits when I fish.

100.name: Explosive Bait
100.info: I can throw this at animals. They will explode when I press the remote trigger!

101.name: Remote Trigger
101.info: A remote trigger for explosive baits.

102.name: Shell
102.info: A shell. I'm wondering what might be inside?

103.name: Starfish
103.info: A starfish. I'm going to call him Patrick! Hurray!

104.name: Net
104.info: Allows to catch little animals flying around.

105.name: Scythe
105.info: Though designed as a harvesting tool, the scythe can be a powerful weapon as well.

106.name: Bottle
106.info: An empty bottle made of glass, which can be filled with water at gushing springs.

107.name: Bark
107.info: A piece of bark. Maybe I can create fire with this...

110.name: Shotgun
110.info: This gun sucks a lot! In exchange it scatters so much I have to be directly in front of my target to hit it at all.

111.name: Torch
111.info: Besides providing illumination, you can attack with a torch to set other things on fire.

112.name: Potion of Haste
112.info: A potion which doubles my movement speed for a minute.

113.name: Immortal Potion
113.info: Tis potion makes me immortal for half a minute!

114.name: Air Potion
114.info: A special air mixture which gives me air for breathing while diving.

115.name: Chocolate Dough
115.info: A dough with cocoa in it. I can use it close to a fire in order to bake it.

116.name: Plums
116.info: Plums! Good for the digestion. He-he...

117.name: Bandage
117.info: A bandage which can be used when I have bleeding wounds.

118.name: First Aid Box
118.info: A first aid box which can be used when I have wounds, fractures or poisonings. Can be used infinitely.

119.name: Worm
119.info: A small worm. Will be used as bait when I fish to get something pretty big on the line!

120.name: Claw Spear
120.info: A spear with sharp claws which can be thrown only once but causes serious damage.
